## Preprocessing

Train a linear regression model.

```{python results = "hide"}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression

df_train = pd.read_csv("data/train.csv")

df_train = df_train.drop(["parentspecies"], axis=1) # string value

X_train = df_train.drop(["Id","pSat_Pa"], axis=1)

y_train = df_train["pSat_Pa"]

model = LinearRegression()
model.fit(X_train, y_train)
```
